_header: Children and young men that come to this City
_description: Moral advice to Apprentices — eight 6-line stanzas

HunHM140.First Lines:
Children and yong men that comme to this CiteeAnd purpose youre
                    self apprentices to be…
HunHM140.Last Lines:
…And that they may lyve honestlyAnd alwey goode vertues to
                    sue
HunHM140.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.223-4.
